document.discussion_title: Curfew in force in Srinagar, normal life disrupted in Valley
document.topic_text: Srinagar remained under curfew on Monday after a teenager was killed by a teargas shell here yesterday, even as normal life in the Valley was paralysed for the 45th day due to restrictions and strike in the wake of violence following killing of Hizbul Mujahideen commander Burhan Wani. »
